"Force": "Force is a class that focuses on causing \"Attribute Down\" phases in enemies by targeting their Attribute weaknesses with long-range Techniques."

"Its Class Skills give it additional ways to recover PP, letting it keep its distance from enemies to keep up the pressure with Techniques.

Here are some of the Class Skills you can acquire as a Force:"

"\"PP Convert\" is an Active Skill that reduces maximum HP but boosts PP regeneration for a set time when activated.

When used in conjunction with the Class Skill \"Photon Flare\", which temporarily boosts maximum PP, it allows you to deal a large amount of damage in a short period of time."
